name: Magic Run v0.5
description:
Magic Run is a casual game that you run for your life. You are a magician but you set a big fire and it follows you. And there are too many obstacles on your way.

How to play:

You have to choose 3 scroll (only one per row). These are your movement, attack and defence scrolls.

"W" for up, "S" for down

If you have at least one attack scroll (fire, lightning or whirl), "E" for fire. 

If you have 2 attack scroll, an ultimate attack scroll (laserbeam, cloud or void) will spawn. With ultimate attack scroll, press "E" for ultimate shot.

But you cannot go left or right without a scroll. Catch a Dash Scroll or Teleport Scroll for escape a little bit.

You can gather the coins, you can use scrolls for escape and you can gather magnet scroll for more magnetic field.

with v0.5 (Shop Update):

  • now game has a shop. you can buy modes and scrolls here (just one mode for now).
  • parallax background.
  • tooltip for some things.
what will be in next Update:
  • New game modes (like no scroll mode, just one scroll modes, sorceress mode).

I hope you like it. Please share your high score.

This game made with Unity. Most of the sounds from zapsplat and Fantasy Music Lite (Vasco Grossmann). Main character reference: One Step From Eden / Saffron.
